storyInfo: Jieyun wishes to restore the Sword Forge to the way her shifu described it to her: some would spar, some would drink, and everyone knew everyone, joining each other in song. By chance, she meets two drunken martial artists.

attributes.content: That girl's been here for days now...
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier A

attributes.content: Well, she hasn't been causing trouble, just doing some cleaning. That's not against General Zuo's orders. Let her be.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier B

attributes.content: As soon as I dust off the sand, another layer forms... Did Uncle Meng have to clean this much?
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: The weapon racks, the tables, and the chairs are all repaired; the tiles are stuck back on, and the forge is lit up...
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Looks more or less like how Shifu described it.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: ...Did you need me for something?
attributes.name: Jing

attributes.content: They say that since Uncle Meng left, the Sword Forge is now under your care.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Shifu would always talk about this place when she was alive, and Uncle Meng treated me kindly. I want to make it look like it used to.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: They told me to find you. I can help. Cleaning, repairing, anything's fine.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: No thanks, I don't need help to keep this place tidy.
attributes.name: Jing

attributes.content: What's the point of making it look like how it did back then? Not like anyone's coming back.
attributes.name: Jing

attributes.content: Can't nail down what doesn't belong.
attributes.name: Jing

attributes.content: Jieyun lifts her head and looks at the Sword Forge.
Every detail of this place cherished by its owner, every chair and table, the tools they refused to replace despite the years... She managed to restore some of these worn-out things.
But the people came and went, until finally, she was the only one left standing here.
No, it's not the same. This still isn't the Sword Forge.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: There should be people here. People fighting, people drinking...
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: May I ask where I can find people to fight outside of the arena?
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: If you don't know, then could you two fight me?
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: ...Certainly not.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier B

attributes.content: Then do you know where I can find people to drink with?
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: I keep telling you not to drink so much! Look at you! You can barely stand!
attributes.name: Half-Drunk Martial Artist

attributes.content: So what? Anyway, we need to go soon, so if you wanna drink more then drink already...
attributes.name: Drunken Martial Artist

attributes.content: You must've seen it too. The arena got smashed up by the Catastrophe, and someone took the rankings board away... Just one last look at the Sword Forge before we go.
attributes.name: Drunken Martial Artist

attributes.content: Fine, fine, just one last look... Don't tell me you're still thinking about the Grandmaster, Meng and whoever it was that got you into competitions?
attributes.name: Half-Drunk Martial Artist

attributes.content: Do you two want to fight me?
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: An Anasa girl stands at the door as she looks at the pair of fighters, the chakram in her hand shining as bright as her eyes. Behind her, a couple of soldiers from the Patrol Battalion look on helplessly.
You know kung fu, right? You can fight—err, compete with me.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: You must have come here to compete, yes?
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: It's clear that she isn't joking. The two martial artists look at her, then at each other.
Once, there was a woman who had her brow raised as high as this girl's. She too called at them, and yelled: 'Come! Let me see if the two of you lazed about instead of training!'
Once...
Yeah! Have at you!
attributes.name: Half-Drunk Martial Artist

attributes.content: In the name of General Zuo, you are not to come any closer—Hey, you two—
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier A

attributes.content: The stage is set, so let us commence with introductions. O Yumen, city of wandering warriors, whose heroism shakes the sky! I am Zhang Chong, Yumen's Maestro of Erlangquan! 'Tis a pleasure!
attributes.name: Drunken Martial Artist

attributes.content: Haha! And I, Lin Feisha, am the fifty-sixth inheritor of the 'Single-Stroke Sword of the Sands' technique!
attributes.name: Half-Drunk Martial Artist

attributes.content: State your name, lady, and from whence you hail!
attributes.name: Half-Drunk Martial Artist

attributes.content: J—Jieyun, Anasa.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Hey, the hell do you think you're doing, taking up a stance?
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier A

attributes.content: Wh—What should we do? Arrest these troublemakers?
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier A

attributes.content: ...I'm going to move those two stools aside.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier B

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier A

attributes.content: The arena needs to be kept clear during a match, doesn't it?
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier B

attributes.content: The soldiers silently take two steps back, and the once-quiet courtyard now thrummed with the sound of flurrying fists once more.
Spurred on by drunken courage and the sand-laden wind, the martial artists shoot forward, their arms a blur of blows as they try to suppress Jieyun from using her weapon.
Haha, yes, that's it! This is how it should be! Mark well the four sides of the arena, how neat and straight they are...
attributes.name: Drunken Martial Artist

attributes.content: What tripe! If you want to talk about how the ring should be, then what were you reaching for just now? Don't think I don't know about your hidden weapon!
attributes.name: Half-Drunk Martial Artist

attributes.content: And what's wrong with that? I worked hard learning how to use it! Haven't I saved your sorry behind with it before?
attributes.name: Drunken Martial Artist

attributes.content: It's a match in the ring! No hidden weapons!
attributes.name: Half-Drunk Martial Artist

attributes.content: Fine, fine, I won't use it. But according to custom, until the match begins, you must seal the point of your blade in pine resin!
attributes.name: Drunken Martial Artist

attributes.content: Very well. I'll set aside my chakram too.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Come at me!
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: You're on!
attributes.name: Drunken Martial Artist

attributes.content: A few rounds ago, Jieyun noticed the drunken state of her opponents. Their footwork was sloppy, and their attacks were clumsy. All she needed was a single blow to knock them out of the ring.
But...

The more the pair fight, the clearer their eyes become. The more blows they send out, the more disciplined their strikes. As if this is no mere post-drink bout they joined on a lark, but a true match in the ring...
Even though they are already out of regular moves.
She can't help but slow her offensive.
Haha! I knew it was a good idea to tell you to drink less!
attributes.name: Half-Drunk Martial Artist

attributes.content: What're you laughing at? We need to keep pushing forward!
attributes.name: Drunken Martial Artist

attributes.content: You're supposed to be going all-out during a match, lady! I can tell you're going easy on us!
attributes.name: Drunken Martial Artist

attributes.content: You can't do that! Give us everything you've got!
attributes.name: Drunken Martial Artist

attributes.content: Haaaaah!
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Uaaagh!
attributes.name: Half-Drunk Martial Artist

attributes.content: *cough* *cough* Wh—What an amazing strike, lady!
attributes.name: Drunken Martial Artist

attributes.content: Yeah! That's how you do it! Err...
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier B

attributes.content: *cough*.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier B

attributes.content: Jieyun wipes away the thin layer of sweat above her brow. The forge is roaring, and the fight is taxing, leaving everyone with red faces from the heat.
The Anasa girl has not yet come down from her battle high, but she feels like now would be a good time for a stiff drink.
Are you thirsty?
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Liedaozi. The wine you're always drinking.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Here.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Ah, that fragrance! That's the stuff!
attributes.name: Half-Drunk Martial Artist

attributes.content: Here.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: For us?
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier A

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Not while we're on duty.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier A

attributes.content: Look, don't keep holding that bowl up like that, miss... We've got our orders...
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier B

attributes.content: The Anasa girl does not move her hand an inch, her eyes as clear as the Liedaozi in the bowl.
If he did not acquiesce, she would probably stare at him for days on end.
You—I—*sigh* Fine.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier B

attributes.content: Shifu said I should toast like... this.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: The bowls clink against one another, producing a crisp note just as they once did many years ago. Wine splashes out and soaks into the sandy ground.
Fighter and soldier alike raise their bowls in the Sword Forge's courtyard. They then raise their heads and drain the booze dry.
So that's what it tastes like...
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: It dawns on the Anasa girl.
She understands why the people of Yumen love to fight, and why everyone can make peace afterwards and drink together.
She understands why her shifu liked this place so much.
Jieyun bends down, scoops up some sand soaked with wine and puts it into a pouch.
Now this place is like the Sword Forge you told me about, Shifu.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: At first, Jieyun was considering saying something more, or joining everyone for another cup of wine, or start singing to the sandstorm and the pagoda tree like Shifu said she used to...
Alright, well, it was nice having some fun with you all.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier A

attributes.content: Sure was...
attributes.name: Sober Martial Artist

attributes.content: The last convoy out of the city's about to arrive. We should head off now.
attributes.name: Sober Martial Artist

attributes.content: We managed to have one last match before we left. It was worth coming over...
attributes.name: Sober Martial Artist

attributes.content: Jianghu zai jian, lady. Don't forget today's match. It might be Yumen's very last one.
attributes.name: Sober Martial Artist

attributes.content: 'Very last'...
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: That can't be—Eh? You...
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: The martial artists do not respond.
They stand up, place down their bowls, then walk away as they kick up dust. They do not look back.
Jieyun watches them as they walk off. Their gait is steady, as though they were not drinking just now. As though they were never drunk. As though all that just happened had not.
Why 'very last'?
...Hey, what's the big idea? Just walking off after they're done fighting?
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier A

attributes.content: And why'd you let them walk away anyway? Not scared they're going to cause more of a ruckus after drinking?
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier A

attributes.content: Didn't you see the luggage they had by the doorway? I know those two. They're not from Yumen. Seems like they're leaving the city to head back to their hometown.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier B

attributes.content: It's the last time they're leaving, too. They just wanted to come here for a match, and that was their last match ever.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier B

attributes.content: Can't nail down what doesn't belong.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier B

attributes.content: But... They really put their all into that fight today.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier B

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier A

attributes.content: So that's what that meant.
Can't nail down what doesn't belong.
One day later
About the Sword Forge, Jieyun...
attributes.name: Jing

attributes.content: I don't think what I said was wrong, but that day at the Forge, I was too hard on you...
attributes.name: Jing

attributes.content: *sigh* Would you like to stay in Yumen?
attributes.name: Jing

attributes.content: I've got a fair few friends here. No matter what you're thinking of doing, I can help find a place willing to take you in.
attributes.name: Jing

attributes.content: No need.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Shifu's content now, and I managed to have a real fight here. I rather enjoyed it.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: I'll be heading off soon myself.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Where're you headed?
attributes.name: Jing

attributes.content: Jieyun does not answer. She walks out of Yumen's gates, slowly singing a song.
The sun goes down, east next morn, it rises up again ♪
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: The moon comes up, west next morn, we'll see it sink below ♪
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: The cracks fill out arid rock and through the soil, next year's raindrops will wet them as they land ♪
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: The shrubs deep in the sands are dried and die, and springs below will bring them back to life ♪
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: A gale blows past, carrying along the surging sands rushing out of the sand channels, covering up Jieyun's figure as it fades into the distance.
I've seen Jiangnan, and tried some water chestnuts, and also met the people of the jianghu that Shifu talked about.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: I think... I'll do some wandering of my own. See what's around.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: See things that can really make me like Shifu, with lots and lots of memorable people and things to talk about.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: We're here for our punishment, General Zuo.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier A

attributes.content: While on duty yesterday, we drank without leave. According to military law, we are to be caned for our transgression.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier B

attributes.content: The seal has already been written, General. The one for the Sword Forge...?
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier B

attributes.content: You don't need to ask me about that matter again.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Since you drank that wine yourselves that day, you can decide for yourselves as well.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao
